00002 /*! zgbmatrix+zgematrix operator */
00003 inline _zgematrix operator+(const zgbmatrix& matA, const zgematrix& matB)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const zgbmatrix&, const zgematrix&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.M){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(zgbmatrix&, zgematrix&)" << std::endl
00013               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00014               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00015               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00016     exit(1);
00017   }
00018 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00019 
00020   zgematrix newmat(matB);
00021   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00022     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00023       newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00024     }
00025   }
00026   
00027   return _(newmat);
00028 }

00032 inline _zgematrix operator-(const zgbmatrix& matA, const zgematrix& matB)
00033 {
00034 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00035   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const zgbmatrix&, const zgematrix&)"
00036             << std::endl;
00037 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00038   
00039 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00040   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.M){
00041     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(zgbmatrix&, zgematrix&)" << std::endl
00042               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00043               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00044               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00045     exit(1);
00046   }
00047 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00048   
00049   zgematrix newmat(-matB);
00050   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00051     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00052       newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00053     }
00054   }
00055   
00056   return _(newmat);
00057 }

00060 /*! zgbmatrix*zgematrix operator */
00061 inline _zgematrix operator*(const zgbmatrix& matA, const zgematrix& matB)
00062 {
00063 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00064   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const zgbmatrix&, const zgematrix&)"
00065             << std::endl;
00066 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00067   
00068 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00069   if(matA.N!=matB.M){
00070     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(zgbmatrix&, zgematrix&)" << std::endl
00071               << "These two matrises can not make a product." << std::endl
00072               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") * ("
00073               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00074     exit(1);
00075   }
00076 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00077   
00078   zgematrix newmat( matA.M, matB.N );
00079   newmat.zero();
00080   
00081   long i, j, k;
00082 #pragma omp parallel for private(j,k)
00083   for(i=0; i<newmat.m; i++){
00084     for(j=0; j<newmat.n; j++){
00085       for(k=max(0,i-matA.KL); k<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); k++){
00086         newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,k)*matB(k,j);
00087       }
00088     }
00089   }
00090   
00091   return _(newmat);
00092 }
